roleset.name: to utter with a hiss
roleset.note: HISS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hiss' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from hiss.01-v predicate notes)
HISSING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from hissing.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [`` What 's he doing [*T*-93] ? '']-1 hissed [*T*-1] my companion , who [*T*-91] was the only other English-speaking member of the convention and whose knuckles [*T*-92] were white .
example.arg: my companion , who [*T*-91] was the only other English-speaking member of the convention and whose knuckles [*T*-92]were white
